patthana23.20:4.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:4.2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.20:5.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:5.2: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.20:6.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:6.2: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.20:6.4: (Cattāri gaṇitakena dve dve pañhā kātabbā. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana23.20:8.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:8.2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.20:10.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naabyākato dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.20:11.1: Ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā dvādasa, anantare terasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, kamme sattarasa, natthiyā vigate terasa.
